title: Vigilante but they knows how to shoot more than once.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
> You have 3 uses of your ability.

> You can use your ability multiple times per night.

> The night after killing a townie, you will deal a basic attack to yourself. If you survive the basic attack, you won’t try and attack yourself again, but won’t be able to shoot any more.

desc:
Post 2070
*"Wait, you're telling me there are guns that don't take 12 hours to reload?"*
